channel.title: Need help with pking question
channel.description:
I wnat to make it so whenever some one kills someone in the wilderness it yells it to the whole server (i.e. Player1 has killed Player 2.) I don't know what the code would be because I don't know how to differentiate between the 2 players. Any help?
I'm using delta.

item.title: Need help with pking question
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

[quote=“RuneSpace, post:1, topic:373928”][quote author=eyeownyew link=topic=469788.msg3435769#msg3435769 date=1292750865]

Add this into your death method:

yell("killa."+playerName+" has just OWNED "+playerName+"!");

Try more like:

yell(killa.playerName+" has just OWNED "+playerName+"!");

[/quote]

No, Fuck off please…

Your code will say Dead has just owner Dead!

killa. is the instance of killer in death methods, playerName is dead nub[/quote]

LOL me or him? xD, and i think thee is a flaw in my code

yell(""+killa.playerName+" has just OWNED "+playerName+"");

Try one of the two i gave you

Read full topic
